resources.string: What do you know about the current digital video and control standards?
Find out by taking this short quiz!
1) Which of the following are transmission mediums for control signals?
2) Which of the following is a protocol used to protect copyrighted material?
3) EDID is a data structure provided by a digital display to describe its capabilities to a video source.
4) An HDMI balun is an interface used to convert HDMI to VGA.
